block.p: Angela Tanney Hoyt and Andrew Ralph Miele III were married yesterday in Springfield, N.J. The Rev. Robert B. Stagg performed the Roman Catholic ceremony at St. James the Apostle Church.

Mrs. Miele, 42, is a tax lobbyist in Watchung, N.J., for the Motion Picture Association of America. She graduated from the State University College at Brockport, N.Y., and received a master's degree in public administration from SUNY at Albany. She is a daughter of Caroline Johnson of New Port Richey, Fla., and Donald C. Hoyt of Delmar, N.Y., and a stepdaughter of Mary Fitzgerald Hoyt and of Arthur Johnson.
